The Horse of Evil

悪(あく)ノ(ノ)馬(うま)aku NO uma

The Horse of Evil is a short story and a manga inspired by said short story both released on August 23, 2022 in the anthologies Kagamine Rin & Len 14th Birthday Novels and Kagamine Rin & Len 14th Birthday Comics, respectively. The works are named after an unpublished and unfinished song mothy mentioned on his blog.

Translation: Scene 1 · Scene 2 · Scene 3 · Scene 4 · Scene 5 · Scene 6 · Scene 7 · Scene 8
